aspect.name: Function
aspect.subtitle: GO, Pathways, Domains
aspect.intro-text: Annotations that me be used to infer function include GO, Pathways, Protein Domains

aspect.name: Genes
aspect.subtitle: Genome annotation
aspect.intro-text: The gene structure and other genome annotation in SynBioMine are provided by Genbank.

aspect.name: Proteins
aspect.subtitle: Protein annotation
aspect.intro-text: The protein annotations in SynBioMine are provided by UniProt.

aspect.name: Expression
